label: Uploads Cleanup
description: CLean up disk space and delete uploaded files.
long_description:
Attention!!! Always make backup of uploads folder and Joomcck BD before using this tool. You will not be able to restore files through Audit log after this tool is applied.

When users delete files they are not removed from disk giving Joomcck opportunity to restore through version control.

Sometimes users attach and upload files but not finalize article save.
